# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory
#
# Get latest from https://github.com/github/gitignore/blob/master/Unity.gitignore
#
/Library/
/Temp/
/Obj/
/Build/
/Builds/
/Logs/
/MemoryCaptures/
/lfs/
/hooks/

# Never ignore Asset meta data
!/Assets/**/*.meta

# Uncomment this line if you wish to ignore the asset store tools plugin
# /Assets/AssetStoreTools*

# TextMesh Pro files
/Assets/TextMesh*Pro/

# Autogenerated Jetbrains Rider plugin
/Assets/Plugins/Editor/JetBrains*

# Visual Studio cache directory
.vs/

# Visual Studio Code cache directory
.vscode/
.vsconfig/

# Gradle cache directory
.gradle/

# Autogenerated VS/MD/Consulo solution and project files
ExportedObj/
.consulo/
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.mdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db
*.code-workspace

# Unity3D generated meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta
*.mdb.meta

# Unity3D generated file on crash reports
sysinfo.txt
*.cache
*.log

# Builds
*.apk
*.unitypackage

# Crashlytics generated file
crashlytics-build.properties

# StreamingAssets
/Assets/StreamingAssets
/Assets/StreamingAssets.meta


# Customize
/Deployment/
/UserSettings/
/Assets/*/Temp/
/Assets/*/Temp.meta
/Assets/Framework/MeshParticleSystem/ParticleProfiler/ProfilerData
/Assets/Framework/MeshParticleSystem/ParticleProfiler/ProfilerData.meta
/Assets/Application/main/XLua/Gen
/Assets/Application/main/XLua/Gen.meta
/Assets/Assets.index
/Assets/Assets.index.meta
Temp
*Temp.meta


# some plugins
/Assets/AssetBundles-Browser-master
/Assets/AssetBundles-Browser-master.meta
/Assets/AssetUsageDetector
/Assets/AssetUsageDetector.meta
/Assets/BuildReports
/Assets/BuildReports.meta


# some native plugin projects
*vcxproj.filters
*vcxproj.user
TestNative/Release
TestNative/Debug
TestNative/x64

*.androidpack.meta
